> Now when I generate the javadoc all of the junit test classes become
> visible and ruin my nice javadoc interfaces.


I have a separate hierarchy for the application code and for the test 
classes.  I am then able to only compile the application classes without 
their tests and to only generate javadoc of the application classes.

hierachies:
   src/main (= main.src)
   src/test

   <javadoc
     sourcepath="${main.src}"
     destdir="${api.dest}"

-Vladimir
